articles.title: Shock as former Oldham striker Desire Segbe Azankpo joins Bayern Munich - Daily Mail
articles.description: Segbe took to Instagram on Sunday to confirm his move to the Bundesliga champions on a two-year deal, reuniting with close friend Sadio Mane.
articles.content:
Sadio Mane played a role in former Oldham striker Desire Segbe Azankpo joining Bayern Munich's reserve team this summer, according to reports.
